name: Opuntia
Relationship: Compare: Chaparro Margosa (which Mexican physicians laud as a specific in chronic diarrhoea). Ricinus communis (diarrhoea, dysentery, obstinate chronic diarrhoea).
details: Diarrhoea, with nausea. FEELS AS IF BOWELS WERE SETTLED DOWN IN LOWER ABDOMEN. Sick feeling in lower third of abdomen. Enteroptosis with loose and frequent evacuations.
